item.description:
Hi folks! Hope you can join us in exploring the wintery outdoors and getting some exercise in the company of friends.

WHEN AND WHERE: This Meetup will take place at Sleeping Giant, which is a Connecticut State Park located in Hamden. Meet at the big trail map at the Park entrance, which is located on Mt. Carmel Avenue, between 11:55 and 12:00, and the hike will begin at 12:05.

COST: Please contribute one dollar towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website. Please bring any contributions with you on the day of the hike. Please donate no more than $12 per year -- you keep track.

DIRECTIONS: Please see Sleeping Giant State Park Website.

PARKING NOTE: It is usually free to park inside the gate after Labor Day. Please note that at random times the DEP charges a fee to park in the lot. In such cases, please take advantage of the street parking on Mt. Carmel Avenue, adjacent to park, ACROSS FROM (not inside) Quinnipiac University.

Trail maps are usually available at the park entrance, if you want to get to know the park.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: Winter Walk at Sleeping Giant
